nodes.text: Mhu'anThul was an Old One worshipped as a deity by the Zhell on Coruscant. Originating from the world of Mezzallmech in the pocket dimension of Dark Illathurion, Mhu'anThul was a tentacled monstrosity who served the Sith god Typhojem as his chief lieutenant. At some point in the pre-Republic era, Mhu'anThul covertly ruled Coruscant.

Mhu'anThul was created by author Joe Bongiorno for Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, a novella originally slated for release through the Star Wars Hyperspace service. After the cancellation of Hyperspace, the novella was never officially published. It was eventually published in 2018 on The Star Wars Expanded Universe Timeline.
